"Matching":
"For Quests in which you fight alongside other players, such as Emergency Quests, the process by which you find other players is called Matching.

You can view the time spent Matching and the number of participants under \"Matching Status\" in the Matching window.

When the number of participants reaches the Quest's maximum limit, the Quest will start automatically."

"You can check whether your Party Members are participating under \"Party Status\".

Can Participate: Matching was successful.
Not Participating: They are temporarily unavailable for some reason.
Cannot Participate: They are in the Beauty Salon or in another Section."

"If anyone proposes starting the Quest immediately, then the \"Depart Immediately\" button will be displayed, along with the number of players who have accepted and the time remaining.

If all participating players agree in time, the Quest will begin.
â€»Not answering is treated as agreement."
